title: Why do you love your favorite songs? | Scarlet Keys
description: Songs are the soundtrack of our lives. But why exactly do they make us feel the way they do? Songwriter Scarlet Keys sits down at a piano to deconstruct the tools musicians use to make a melody unforgettable — from tone and repetition to lyrics and chords — and sheds light on music's ability to transform moments into memories.
author: Scarlet Keys
excerpt: Songs are the soundtrack of our lives. But why exactly do they make us feel the way they do?
